Institut National de la Recherche Agronomique (INRA)

Legal remit of the entity or organisation: French public research institute dedicated to scientific studies concerning agriculture. INRA has no official responsibility to carry out risk management Expert’s role: do research as a senior scientist in INRA a public research institut with research groups working on plant and animal molecular biology.
